did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Articles, reports, papers and speeches by Victor Roterus, including material concerning foreign regional development, urban planning, population changes in cities, industrial development, and the economic development of specific areas, including southern Alaska and the upper Great Lakes region.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Member, International Fraternity of Lambda Alpha, George Washington Chapter.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Articles, reports, papers and speeches by Victor Roterus, including material concerning foreign regional development, urban planning, population changes in cities, industrial development, and the economic development of specific areas, including southern Alaska and the upper Great Lakes region.

controlaccess.head: Names:

odd.head: NOTES
